body.name: Cantu Hydrating Cream Conditioner with Shea Butter for Natural Hair, 13.5 fl oz (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 39 mins
features: REPLENISHES: Pure shea butter replenishes important moisture
HELPS PROTECT HAIR: Helps prevent breakage and protects hair’s vital natural oils after cleansing
GREAT FOR: Type 2 waves, Type 3 curls, & Type 4 coils
NO HARSH INGREDIENTS: formulated with no mineral oil, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, drying alcohol, paraffin or propylene
CRUELTY-FREE: absolutely no testing on animals
body.description: Cantu Shea Butter for Natural Hair Sulfate-Free Hydrating Cream Conditioner 13.5 fl oz delivers an added layer of moisture after shampooing. Formulated with an award-winning blend of pure shea butter and essential oils, the Hydrating Cream Conditioner helps protect curls against breakage and split ends for stronger, healthier hair. Enjoy ultimate hydration and complete conditioning without the use of harsh ingredients like mineral oil, drying alcohol, sulfates, parabens, silicones, phthalates, paraffin, or propylene. For best results, pair with the Sulfate-Free Cleansing Cream Shampoo. Since the beginning, you’ve pushed us to advance skin and hair science to honor your locs, your curls, your waves, your braids, your natural. At Cantu, we support your journey with care and we celebrate all the styles you rock!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your coils, waves, curls, locs, and braids will love the hydrating and nourishing ingredients with Cantu For Natural Hair Collection formulated with powerful essential oils and pure shea butter. Find everything your hair needs to condition, style, and strengthen with Cantu. Each product in this collection has been curated and specially developed to care for your hair; leaving it softer, stronger, and more protected than ever against breakage and damage. You deserve to look even more gorgeous and glowing and ready to take on the day!

Infused with enriching ingredients like shea butter, castor oil, and jojoba oil, we designed this collection with coils and waves in mind. Moisturize, nourish, and shape your natural curls to get the look you deserve. Enjoy hair care formulated for your lifestyle and designed to fit seamlessly into your hair care routine We believe holistic care isn’t just part of a good hair care routine. At Cantu, we extend holistic care to our communities. This means empowering young women of color to become the entrepreneurs and leaders of the future. It means supplying Black and Latina women with the resources to follow their ambition fiercely. Because everyone deserves to be their most confident self. We know how important the ingredients of your hair care routine are to you. That’s why we make sure to include no harsh ingredients in our formulas, so you can feel confident, secure, and cared for when you wear your natural hair with Cantu. Our products are specially formulated to give your locs, curls, coils, waves, and braids the extra love & attention they deserve. Our nuanced formulas are created with your confidence and curls health in mind, and with absolutely no testing on animals.

LEAVE-IN CONDITIONING CREAM COCONUT CURLING CREAM COMEBACK CURL NEXT DAY CURL REVITALIZER MOISTURIZING TWIST & LOCK GEL CLEANSING SHAMPOO RINSE-OUT CONDITIONER APPLICATION TYPE Cream Cream Spray Gel Cream Cream USE Treatment Treatment & styling Styling Styling Cleanse Condition Targets Dry, damaged hair Dry, brittle hair Full head Braids, twists & locs Full head Full Head REPLACES VITAL MOISTURE & PROMOTES STRONGER, HEALTHIER HAIR ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ INFUSED WITH Pure shea butter, olive oil, coconut oil, jojoba seed oil, mango seed oil, macadamia oil, grapeseed oil, avocado oil, & argan oil Pure shea butter and coconut oil Pure shea butter & castor oil Pure shea butter, coconut oil, avocado oil, almond oil, jojoba seed oil, olive oil, mango seed oil, carrot seed oil, & grapeseed oil Pure shea butter Pure shea butter GREAT FOR Curls & coils Type 3 & type 4 curls & coils Curls & coils Curls & coils Waves, curls & coils Waves, curls & coils

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very effective conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Have been using Cantu Hydrating Cream Conditioner along with the matching Cream shampoo for a few days and I am very happy with this. I have short, thin, fine hair with a slight wave and the conditioner does not weigh my hair down but rather seems to give it body and lift. I do find that with this conditioner if I use a generous amount, work it in really well wherever my hair feels rough and dry and leave it for 3-5 minutes before rinsing it seems to work the best. But I feel you do need to work it into the hair with purpose. The shampoo cleans well and suds up even without sulfates. Also, the scent of the shampoo and conditioner is very mild, sort of fruity/citrusy, not overpowering. I would recommend this hair combo for any hair type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really helps with long thick hair. And not a strong odor.

reviews.reviewText: I tend to have dry hair making my scalp go itch. I’ve been using this product for like a month and the itch has gone and my hair feels softer and more silky. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is wonderful stuff! It makes my thick, curly and very dry hair so soft and it smells heavenly. Very reasonably priced too.
Es un suavizante estupendo, huele genial y hidrata mucho, es apto para método curly.

Für Menschen, die unter der Schuppenflechte auf der Kopfhaut leiden, dass beste Produkt , das ich je hatte. Bereits nach 3 Wochen Anwendung, hat sich meine Kopfhaut wesentlich verbessert. Kann ich nur empfehlen. Meinen Dank.
